description: A global event callback that listens to all events fired by the table. The `eventName` identifies the event being triggered.
Triggered when data is successfully loaded into the table.
Triggered when there is an error while loading data into the table.
Fires before the table body is rendered. Useful for manipulating or preparing data before display.
Fires after the table body is rendered. Can be used for additional DOM manipulations or enhancements.
Triggered once the footer is rendered.
Triggered when the table is refreshed. Includes the parameters of the refresh request.
Called when a column is sorted. The `name` parameter defines the column field, and `order` specifies the sort direction.
Fired when a cell is clicked. Provides field name, its value, the data row, and the clicked cell element.
Triggered when a row is clicked. Provides the row data, the table row element, and the field of the clicked cell.
Called when a row is checked. Provides the row data and the related checkbox input element.
Fires when all rows are checked.
Triggered when a row is unchecked. Provides the row data and the related checkbox input element.
Fires when all rows are unchecked.
